name: Accordion
description: Accordion groups a collection of contents in tabs.

multiple.label: multiple
multiple.title: When enabled, multiple tabs can be activated at the same time.

active-index.label: activeIndex
active-index.title: Index of the active tab or an array of indexes in multiple mode.

lazy.label: lazy
lazy.title: When enabled, hidden tabs are not rendered at all. Defaults to false that hides tabs with css.

tabindex.label: tabindex
tabindex.title: Index of the element in tabbing order.

select-on-focus.label: selectOnFocus
select-on-focus.title: When enabled, the focused tab is activated.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

pt-options.label: ptOptions
pt-options.title: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: default
slots.title: Default slot to detect AccordionTab components.
